U

UDPReceiver - Class in demo.Zhihao.Client
This class is transplanted from the IMServer project.
This is used to retrieve the messages sent using UDP.
UDPReceiver(DatagramSocket) - Constructor for class demo.Zhihao.Client.UDPReceiver
Creates a new UDPReceiver by specifying UDP socket.
UDPSender - Class in demo.Zhihao.Client
Used to send datagrams via a specified UDP protocol.
UDPSender(String, int) - Constructor for class demo.Zhihao.Client.UDPSender
Creates a UDPSender by specifying the IP and port number of counterpart(server or other client).
UIChatRoom - Class in demo.Zhihao.Client
The GUI of the chatroom.
UIChatRoom(ChatClient) - Constructor for class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIChatRoom
Creates a UIChatRoom by specifying ChatClient.
UIEmotionButton - Class in demo.Zhihao.Client
A label to display the emotion icon.
This class should NOT be instantiated elsewhere other than UIEmotionPane.
UIEmotionButton(int) - Constructor for class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIEmotionButton
Creates a UIEmotionButton with specified image.
UIEmotionPane - Class in demo.Zhihao.Client
A pane showing all the emotion icons and used to insert emotion icons into the document.
UIEmotionPane(Document) - Constructor for class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIEmotionPane
Creates an EmotionPane.
This class should NOT be created more than once.
This pane contains 39 icons.
UIPrivateConversation - Class in demo.Zhihao.Client
This is the view part of the Private Conversation Module.
UIPrivateConversation(String, PrivateConv) - Constructor for class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIPrivateConversation
Creates a new UIPrivateConversation instance.
UIRoomContent - Class in demo.Zhihao.Client
This is the content part of the client GUI
including display box, bulletin, message box, send button, member list.
UIRoomContent(ChatClient) - Constructor for class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIRoomContent
Creates a new UIRoomContent component by specifying the model.
UIRoomTitle - Class in demo.Zhihao.Client
The title part of the chat room,
including the chat room name, description and the user logged in information.
UIRoomTitle(String, String, String) - Constructor for class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIRoomTitle
Creates a new UIRoomTitle component by specifying room name, room description and user name.
This class should not be instantiated elsewhere other than UIChatRoom.
updateMemberList(String[]) - Method in class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIChatRoom
Updates the member list.
updateMemberList(String[]) - Method in class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIRoomContent
Updates the member list.
updateRoomInfo(String, String, String) - Method in class demo.Zhihao.Client.UIChatRoom
Updates the room information.
This method is called during the initialization process as well as the running process.
